text: Cxx is kind of bolting a C++ compiler onto Julia, I think.  CBinding.jl is just using libclang to translate C/C++ syntax into Julia equivalent constructs on-the-fly, so a lighter-weight, less intrusive, and more easily maintainable package.  Not sure yet how well C++ templates will translate though...
